snippet: Shares of banks and technology stocks rose the most, while traditional safe-play stocks fell....
abstract: Standard & Poor's 500-stock index closes at record high of 2,137.16, eclipsing peak it hit over year ago, with technology stocks and banks leading pack; financial experts speculate investors now think so-called Brexit does not affect them locally and have resumed buying stocks.
lead_paragraph: Shares of banks and technology stocks rose the most, while traditional safe-play stocks fell.

headline.main: S.& P. 500 Hits Record, as Dow Nears Peak
headline.print_headline: S.&P. 500 Hits Record, as Dow Nears Peak
